name: npm3
description: Wraps npm v3 so you can run it alongside npm v2

scripts.selfupdate: npm install --cache-min=0 --save npm@$(npm info npm@^3.0.0 version --cache-min=Infinity | tail -n 1 | cut -d ' ' -f 2 | cut -d "'" -f 2 && npm run commit
scripts.commit: export NPM_VERSION=$(npm info npm@^3.0.0 version --cache-min=Infinity | tail -n 1 | cut -d ' ' -f 2 | cut -d "'" -f 2); git add . && git commit -m "Upgrade to npm@$NPM_VERSION"

author: Tim Oxley <secoif@gmail.com>
